item.title: The super lazy iterator in C# and Java
item.description: A super lazy iterator is known by functional programmers as the List Monad. This is not another Monad tutorial but focusses on what was added to C# and Java to allow retrofitting this super lazy iterator to C# and Java. With this super iterator you can: Iterate over a collection skipping elements by predicate. where clause or filter. Project the elements in a collection into something different select clause, project or map.
